hadiths.text: Qatada said:I asked Anas (Allah be pleased with him) as to how many Pilgrimages had been performed by Allah's Messenger (ﷺ), and he replied: One Hajj and four `Umras were performed by him. The rest of the hadith is the same

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيَانِ عَدَدِ عُمَرِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَزَمَانِهِنَّ
chapter.eng-name: The number of Umrahs performed by the prophet (ﷺ) and when he performed them
